trans-unit.source: Assign a Priority Level to a Vendor | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Assign a Priority Level to a Vendor | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Přiřazení úrovně priority dodavateli | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: You can assign numbers to your vendors or suppliers to prioritize them and facilitate payment suggestions in Business Central.

seg-source.mrk: You can assign numbers to your vendors or suppliers to prioritize them and facilitate payment suggestions in Business Central.

target.mrk: Svým dodavatelům můžete přiřadit čísla, abyste jim určili prioritu a usnadnili tak návrhy plateb v Business Central.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] can suggest various payments to vendors, for example, payments that will be due soon or payments where a discount is available.

seg-source.mrk: can suggest various payments to vendors, for example, payments that will be due soon or payments where a discount is available.

target.mrk: může navrhnout různé platby dodavatelům, například platby, které budou brzy splatné, nebo platby, u kterých je k dispozici sleva.

trans-unit.source: First, you must prioritize your vendors by assigning numbers to them.

seg-source.mrk: First, you must prioritize your vendors by assigning numbers to them.

target.mrk: Nejprve musíte upřednostnit své dodavatele přiřazením čísel.

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Vendors**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Vendors**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovky, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zadejte **Dodavatelé** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Select the relevant vendor, and then choose **Edit**.

seg-source.mrk: Select the relevant vendor, and then choose **Edit**.

target.mrk: Vyberte příslušného dodavatele a poté zvolte **Upravit**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Priority** field, enter a number.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Priority** field, enter a number.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] considers the lowest number, except 0, to have the highest priority.

seg-source.mrk: considers the lowest number, except 0, to have the highest priority.

target.mrk: považuje nejnižší číslo kromě 0 za nejvyšší prioritu.

trans-unit.source: So, for example, if you use 1, 2, and 3, then 1 will have the highest priority.

seg-source.mrk: So, for example, if you use 1, 2, and 3, then 1 will have the highest priority.

target.mrk: Například, pokud používáte 1, 2 a 3, pak 1 bude mít nejvyšší prioritu.

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to prioritize a vendor, leave the **Priority** field blank.

seg-source.mrk: If you do not want to prioritize a vendor, leave the **Priority** field blank.

target.mrk: Pokud si nepřejete upřednostňovat dodavatele, ponechte pole **Priorita** prázdné.

trans-unit.source: Then, if you use the payment suggestion feature, the vendor will be listed after all the vendors that have a priority number.

seg-source.mrk: Then, if you use the payment suggestion feature, the vendor will be listed after all the vendors that have a priority number.

target.mrk: Pokud použijete funkci navrhování plateb, bude dodavatel uveden za všemi dodavateli, kteří mají prioritní číslo.

trans-unit.source: You can enter as many priority levels as necessary.

seg-source.mrk: You can enter as many priority levels as necessary.

target.mrk: Můžete zadat libovolný počet úrovní priority.
